snippet: Dwight Howard’s interest in joining the Brooklyn team changed the landscape of the N.B.A., rendering the Nets no longer a punch line, but a destination.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column observes that Orlando Magic star center Dwight Howard's interest in joining the Brooklyn Nets has changed the landscape of the NBA, rendering the Nets no longer a punch line, but a destination.
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard’s interest in joining the Brooklyn team changed the landscape of the N.B.A., rendering the Nets no longer a punch line, but a destination.

headline.seo: Dwight Howard’s Interest In Nets Signals New Era
headline.main: Howard’s Interest Signals New Era for Nets
headline.print_headline: Howard’s Interest Signals New Era for Nets
